alert.note: Alert for Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 4:56PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Leon County through 530 PM EDT... At 455 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tallahassee. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Florida A And M, Ralford Greenway, Gaither Community Center, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Killearn Estates, Chaires, Lake Ella, State Capital Complex, Governors Square Mall, Belair, Apalachee Regional Park, Indian Head Acres, Chaires Crossroads, Baum, Maclay State Gardens, Bragg Stadium, Capitola, Fallschase and Southwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
